statements: DELETE FROM media_ownership WHERE owner_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM company_ownership WHERE shareholder_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM RegulatoryReports WHERE company_id = 3 AND report_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM Company_Ownership WHERE owner_id = 3 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ownership_structure WHERE parent_id = 1 AND shareholder_id = 2;
DELETE FROM subsidiary_company WHERE parent_id = (SELECT id FROM parent_company WHERE country = 'USA');
